00023 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET

00026 #define LNET_NRB_TINY_MIN       512     /* min value for each CPT */
00027 #define LNET_NRB_TINY           (LNET_NRB_TINY_MIN * 4)
00028 #define LNET_NRB_SMALL_MIN      4096    /* min value for each CPT */
00029 #define LNET_NRB_SMALL          (LNET_NRB_SMALL_MIN * 4)
00030 #define LNET_NRB_SMALL_PAGES    1
00031 #define LNET_NRB_LARGE_MIN      256     /* min value for each CPT */
00032 #define LNET_NRB_LARGE          (LNET_NRB_LARGE_MIN * 4)
00033 #define LNET_NRB_LARGE_PAGES    ((LNET_MTU + PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 1) >> \
00034                                   PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT)

00057 int
00058 lnet_peer_buffer_credits(lnet_ni_t *ni)
00059 {
00060         /* NI option overrides LNet default */
00061         if (ni->ni_peerrtrcredits > 0)
00062                 return ni->ni_peerrtrcredits;
00063         if (peer_buffer_credits > 0)
00064                 return peer_buffer_credits;
00065 
00066         /* As an approximation, allow this peer the same number of router
00067          * buffers as it is allowed outstanding sends */
00068         return ni->ni_peertxcredits;
00069 }

00100 void
00101 lnet_notify_locked(lnet_peer_t *lp, int notifylnd, int alive, cfs_time_t when)
00102 {
00103         if (cfs_time_before(when, lp->lp_timestamp)) { /* out of date information */
00104                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Out of date\n");
00105                 return;
00106         }
00107 
00108         lp->lp_timestamp = when;                /* update timestamp */
00109         lp->lp_ping_deadline = 0;               /* disable ping timeout */
00110 
00111         if (lp->lp_alive_count != 0 &&          /* got old news */
00112             (!lp->lp_alive) == (!alive)) {      /* new date for old news */
00113                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Old news\n");
00114                 return;
00115         }
00116 
00117         /* Flag that notification is outstanding */
00118 
00119         lp->lp_alive_count++;
00120         lp->lp_alive = !(!alive);               /* 1 bit! */
00121         lp->lp_notify = 1;
00122         lp->lp_notifylnd |= notifylnd;
00123         if (lp->lp_alive)
00124                 lp->lp_ping_feats = LNET_PING_FEAT_INVAL; /* reset */
00125 
00126         CDEBUG(D_NET, "set %s %d\n", libcfs_nid2str(lp->lp_nid), alive);
00127 }
00128 
00129 static void
00130 lnet_ni_notify_locked(lnet_ni_t *ni, lnet_peer_t *lp)
00131 {
00132         int        alive;
00133         int        notifylnd;
00134 
00135         /* Notify only in 1 thread at any time to ensure ordered notification.
00136          * NB individual events can be missed; the only guarantee is that you
00137          * always get the most recent news */
00138 
00139         if (lp->lp_notifying || ni == NULL)
00140                 return;
00141 
00142         lp->lp_notifying = 1;
00143 
00144         while (lp->lp_notify) {
00145                 alive     = lp->lp_alive;
00146                 notifylnd = lp->lp_notifylnd;
00147 
00148                 lp->lp_notifylnd = 0;
00149                 lp->lp_notify    = 0;
00150 
00151                 if (notifylnd && ni->ni_lnd->lnd_notify != NULL) {
00152                         lnet_net_unlock(lp->lp_cpt);
00153 
00154                         /* A new notification could happen now; I'll handle it
00155                          * when control returns to me */
00156 
00157                         (ni->ni_lnd->lnd_notify)(ni, lp->lp_nid, alive);
00158 
00159                         lnet_net_lock(lp->lp_cpt);
00160                 }
00161         }
00162 
00163         lp->lp_notifying = 0;
00164 }
00165 
00166 
00167 static void
00168 lnet_rtr_addref_locked(lnet_peer_t *lp)
00169 {
00170         LASSERT(lp->lp_refcount > 0);
00171         LASSERT(lp->lp_rtr_refcount >= 0);
00172 
00173         /* lnet_net_lock must be exclusively locked */
00174         lp->lp_rtr_refcount++;
00175         if (lp->lp_rtr_refcount == 1) {
00176                 struct list_head *pos;
00177 
00178                 /* a simple insertion sort */
00179                 list_for_each_prev(pos, &the_lnet.ln_routers) {
00180                         lnet_peer_t *rtr = list_entry(pos, lnet_peer_t,
00181                                                       lp_rtr_list);
00182 
00183                         if (rtr->lp_nid < lp->lp_nid)
00184                                 break;
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 list_add(&lp->lp_rtr_list, pos);
00188                 /* addref for the_lnet.ln_routers */
00189                 lnet_peer_addref_locked(lp);
00190                 the_lnet.ln_routers_version++;
00191         }
00192 }
00193 
00194 static void
00195 lnet_rtr_decref_locked(lnet_peer_t *lp)
00196 {
00197         LASSERT(lp->lp_refcount > 0);
00198         LASSERT(lp->lp_rtr_refcount > 0);
00199 
00200         /* lnet_net_lock must be exclusively locked */
00201         lp->lp_rtr_refcount--;
00202         if (lp->lp_rtr_refcount == 0) {
00203                 LASSERT(list_empty(&lp->lp_routes));
00204 
00205                 if (lp->lp_rcd != NULL) {
00206                         list_add(&lp->lp_rcd->rcd_list,
00207                                  &the_lnet.ln_rcd_deathrow);
00208                         lp->lp_rcd = NULL;
00209                 }
00210 
00211                 list_del(&lp->lp_rtr_list);
00212                 /* decref for the_lnet.ln_routers */
00213                 lnet_peer_decref_locked(lp);
00214                 the_lnet.ln_routers_version++;
00215         }
00216 }
00217 
00218 lnet_remotenet_t *
00219 lnet_find_net_locked (__u32 net)
00220 {
00221         lnet_remotenet_t *rnet;
00222         struct list_head *tmp;
00223         struct list_head *rn_list;
00224 
00225         LASSERT(!the_lnet.ln_shutdown);
00226 
00227         rn_list = lnet_net2rnethash(net);
00228         list_for_each(tmp, rn_list) {
00229                 rnet = list_entry(tmp, lnet_remotenet_t, lrn_list);
00230 
00231                 if (rnet->lrn_net == net)
00232                         return rnet;
00233         }
00234         return NULL;
00235 }
00236 
00237 static void lnet_shuffle_seed(void)
00238 {
00239         static int seeded;
00240         __u32 lnd_type;
00241         __u32 seed[2];
00242         struct timeval tv;
00243         lnet_ni_t *ni;
00244         struct list_head *tmp;
00245 
00246         if (seeded)
00247                 return;
00248 
00249         cfs_get_random_bytes(seed, sizeof(seed));
00250 
00251         /* Nodes with small feet have little entropy
00252          * the NID for this node gives the most entropy in the low bits */
00253         list_for_each(tmp, &the_lnet.ln_nis) {
00254                 ni = list_entry(tmp, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
00255                 lnd_type = LNET_NETTYP(LNET_NIDNET(ni->ni_nid));
00256 
00257                 if (lnd_type != LOLND)
00258                         seed[0] ^= (LNET_NIDADDR(ni->ni_nid) | lnd_type);
00259         }
00260 
00261         do_gettimeofday(&tv);
00262         cfs_srand(tv.tv_sec ^ seed[0], tv.tv_usec ^ seed[1]);
00263         seeded = 1;
00264         return;
00265 }
00266 
00267 /* NB expects LNET_LOCK held */
00268 static void
00269 lnet_add_route_to_rnet(lnet_remotenet_t *rnet, lnet_route_t *route)
00270 {
00271         unsigned int      len = 0;
00272         unsigned int      offset = 0;
00273         struct list_head *e;
00274 
00275         lnet_shuffle_seed();
00276 
00277         list_for_each(e, &rnet->lrn_routes) {
00278                 len++;
00279         }
00280 
00281         /* len+1 positions to add a new entry, also prevents division by 0 */
00282         offset = cfs_rand() % (len + 1);
00283         list_for_each(e, &rnet->lrn_routes) {
00284                 if (offset == 0)
00285                         break;
00286                 offset--;
00287         }
00288         list_add(&route->lr_list, e);
00289         list_add(&route->lr_gwlist, &route->lr_gateway->lp_routes);
00290 
00291         the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_version++;
00292         lnet_rtr_addref_locked(route->lr_gateway);
00293 }
00294 
00295 int
00296 lnet_add_route(__u32 net, __u32 hops, lnet_nid_t gateway,
00297                unsigned int priority)
00298 {
00299         struct list_head        *e;
00300         lnet_remotenet_t        *rnet;
00301         lnet_remotenet_t        *rnet2;
00302         lnet_route_t            *route;
00303         lnet_ni_t               *ni;
00304         int                     add_route;
00305         int                     rc;
00306 
00307         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Add route: net %s hops %d priority %u gw %s\n",
00308                libcfs_net2str(net), hops, priority, libcfs_nid2str(gateway));
00309 
00310         if (gateway == LNET_NID_ANY ||
00311             LNET_NETTYP(LNET_NIDNET(gateway)) == LOLND ||
00312             net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY) ||
00313             LNET_NETTYP(net) == LOLND ||
00314             LNET_NIDNET(gateway) == net ||
00315             (hops != LNET_UNDEFINED_HOPS && (hops < 1 || hops > 255)))
00316                 return -EINVAL;
00317 
00318         if (lnet_islocalnet(net))       /* it's a local network */
00319                 return -EEXIST;
00320 
00321         /* Assume net, route, all new */
00322         LIBCFS_ALLOC(route, sizeof(*route));
00323         LIBCFS_ALLOC(rnet, sizeof(*rnet));
00324         if (route == NULL || rnet == NULL) {
00325                 CERROR("Out of memory creating route %s %d %s\n",
00326                        libcfs_net2str(net), hops, libcfs_nid2str(gateway));
00327                 if (route != NULL)
00328                         LIBCFS_FREE(route, sizeof(*route));
00329                 if (rnet != NULL)
00330                         LIBCFS_FREE(rnet, sizeof(*rnet));
00331                 return -ENOMEM;
00332         }
00333 
00334         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rnet->lrn_routes);
00335         rnet->lrn_net = net;
00336         route->lr_hops = hops;
00337         route->lr_net = net;
00338         route->lr_priority = priority;
00339 
00340         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00341 
00342         rc = lnet_nid2peer_locked(&route->lr_gateway, gateway, LNET_LOCK_EX);
00343         if (rc != 0) {
00344                 lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00345 
00346                 LIBCFS_FREE(route, sizeof(*route));
00347                 LIBCFS_FREE(rnet, sizeof(*rnet));
00348 
00349                 if (rc == -EHOSTUNREACH) /* gateway is not on a local net. */
00350                         return rc;       /* ignore the route entry */
00351                 CERROR("Error %d creating route %s %d %s\n", rc,
00352                         libcfs_net2str(net), hops,
00353                         libcfs_nid2str(gateway));
00354                 return rc;
00355         }
00356 
00357         LASSERT(!the_lnet.ln_shutdown);
00358 
00359         rnet2 = lnet_find_net_locked(net);
00360         if (rnet2 == NULL) {
00361                 /* new network */
00362                 list_add_tail(&rnet->lrn_list, lnet_net2rnethash(net));
00363                 rnet2 = rnet;
00364         }
00365 
00366         /* Search for a duplicate route (it's a NOOP if it is) */
00367         add_route = 1;
00368         list_for_each(e, &rnet2->lrn_routes) {
00369                 lnet_route_t *route2 = list_entry(e, lnet_route_t, lr_list);
00370 
00371                 if (route2->lr_gateway == route->lr_gateway) {
00372                         add_route = 0;
00373                         break;
00374                 }
00375 
00376                 /* our lookups must be true */
00377                 LASSERT(route2->lr_gateway->lp_nid != gateway);
00378         }
00379 
00380         if (add_route) {
00381                 lnet_peer_addref_locked(route->lr_gateway); /* +1 for notify */
00382                 lnet_add_route_to_rnet(rnet2, route);
00383 
00384                 ni = route->lr_gateway->lp_ni;
00385                 lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00386 
00387                 /* XXX Assume alive */
00388                 if (ni->ni_lnd->lnd_notify != NULL)
00389                         (ni->ni_lnd->lnd_notify)(ni, gateway, 1);
00390 
00391                 lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00392         }
00393 
00394         /* -1 for notify or !add_route */
00395         lnet_peer_decref_locked(route->lr_gateway);
00396         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00397 
00398         rc = 0;
00399 
00400         if (!add_route) {
00401                 rc = -EEXIST;
00402                 LIBCFS_FREE(route, sizeof(*route));
00403         }
00404 
00405         if (rnet != rnet2)
00406                 LIBCFS_FREE(rnet, sizeof(*rnet));
00407 
00408         /* indicate to startup the router checker if configured */
00409         wake_up(&the_lnet.ln_rc_waitq);
00410 
00411         return rc;
00412 }
00413 
00414 int
00415 lnet_check_routes(void)
00416 {
00417         lnet_remotenet_t *rnet;
00418         lnet_route_t     *route;
00419         lnet_route_t     *route2;
00420         struct list_head *e1;
00421         struct list_head *e2;
00422         int               cpt;
00423         struct list_head *rn_list;
00424         int               i;
00425 
00426         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00427 
00428         for (i = 0; i < LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_SIZE; i++) {
00429                 rn_list = &the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash[i];
00430                 list_for_each(e1, rn_list) {
00431                         rnet = list_entry(e1, lnet_remotenet_t, lrn_list);
00432 
00433                         route2 = NULL;
00434                         list_for_each(e2, &rnet->lrn_routes) {
00435                                 lnet_nid_t      nid1;
00436                                 lnet_nid_t      nid2;
00437                                 int             net;
00438 
00439                                 route = list_entry(e2, lnet_route_t,
00440                                                    lr_list);
00441 
00442                                 if (route2 == NULL) {
00443                                         route2 = route;
00444                                         continue;
00445                                 }
00446 
00447                                 if (route->lr_gateway->lp_ni ==
00448                                     route2->lr_gateway->lp_ni)
00449                                         continue;
00450 
00451                                 nid1 = route->lr_gateway->lp_nid;
00452                                 nid2 = route2->lr_gateway->lp_nid;
00453                                 net = rnet->lrn_net;
00454 
00455                                 lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00456 
00457                                 CERROR("Routes to %s via %s and %s not "
00458                                        "supported\n",
00459                                        libcfs_net2str(net),
00460                                        libcfs_nid2str(nid1),
00461                                        libcfs_nid2str(nid2));
00462                                 return -EINVAL;
00463                         }
00464                 }
00465         }
00466 
00467         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00468         return 0;
00469 }
00470 
00471 int
00472 lnet_del_route(__u32 net, lnet_nid_t gw_nid)
00473 {
00474         struct lnet_peer        *gateway;
00475         lnet_remotenet_t        *rnet;
00476         lnet_route_t            *route;
00477         struct list_head        *e1;
00478         struct list_head        *e2;
00479         int                     rc = -ENOENT;
00480         struct list_head        *rn_list;
00481         int                     idx = 0;
00482 
00483         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Del route: net %s : gw %s\n",
00484                libcfs_net2str(net), libcfs_nid2str(gw_nid));
00485 
00486         /* NB Caller may specify either all routes via the given gateway
00487          * or a specific route entry actual NIDs) */
00488 
00489         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00490         if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY))
00491                 rn_list = &the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash[0];
00492         else
00493                 rn_list = lnet_net2rnethash(net);
00494 
00495 again:
00496         list_for_each(e1, rn_list) {
00497                 rnet = list_entry(e1, lnet_remotenet_t, lrn_list);
00498 
00499                 if (!(net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY) ||
00500                         net == rnet->lrn_net))
00501                         continue;
00502 
00503                 list_for_each(e2, &rnet->lrn_routes) {
00504                         route = list_entry(e2, lnet_route_t, lr_list);
00505 
00506                         gateway = route->lr_gateway;
00507                         if (!(gw_nid == LNET_NID_ANY ||
00508                               gw_nid == gateway->lp_nid))
00509                                 continue;
00510 
00511                         list_del(&route->lr_list);
00512                         list_del(&route->lr_gwlist);
00513                         the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_version++;
00514 
00515                         if (list_empty(&rnet->lrn_routes))
00516                                 list_del(&rnet->lrn_list);
00517                         else
00518                                 rnet = NULL;
00519 
00520                         lnet_rtr_decref_locked(gateway);
00521                         lnet_peer_decref_locked(gateway);
00522 
00523                         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00524 
00525                         LIBCFS_FREE(route, sizeof(*route));
00526 
00527                         if (rnet != NULL)
00528                                 LIBCFS_FREE(rnet, sizeof(*rnet));
00529 
00530                         rc = 0;
00531                         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00532                         goto again;
00533                 }
00534         }
00535 
00536         if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY) &&
00537             ++idx < LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_SIZE) {
00538                 rn_list = &the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash[idx];
00539                 goto again;
00540         }
00541         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00542 
00543         return rc;
00544 }
00545 
00546 void
00547 lnet_destroy_routes (void)
00548 {
00549         lnet_del_route(LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY), LNET_NID_ANY);
00550 }
00551 
00552 int lnet_get_rtr_pool_cfg(int idx, struct lnet_ioctl_pool_cfg *pool_cfg)
00553 {
00554         int i, rc = -ENOENT, lidx, j;
00555 
00556         if (the_lnet.ln_rtrpools == NULL)
00557                 return rc;
00558 
00559         for (i = 0; i < LNET_NRBPOOLS; i++) {
00560                 lnet_rtrbufpool_t *rbp;
00561 
00562                 lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00563                 lidx = idx;
00564                 cfs_percpt_for_each(rbp, j, the_lnet.ln_rtrpools) {
00565                         if (lidx-- == 0) {
00566                                 rc = 0;
00567                                 pool_cfg->pl_pools[i].pl_npages =
00568                                         rbp[i].rbp_npages;
00569                                 pool_cfg->pl_pools[i].pl_nbuffers =
00570                                         rbp[i].rbp_nbuffers;
00571                                 pool_cfg->pl_pools[i].pl_credits =
00572                                         rbp[i].rbp_credits;
00573                                 pool_cfg->pl_pools[i].pl_mincredits =
00574                                         rbp[i].rbp_mincredits;
00575                                 break;
00576                         }
00577                 }
00578                 lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00579         }
00580 
00581         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00582         pool_cfg->pl_routing = the_lnet.ln_routing;
00583         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00584 
00585         return rc;
00586 }
00587 
00588 int
00589 lnet_get_route(int idx, __u32 *net, __u32 *hops,
00590                lnet_nid_t *gateway, __u32 *alive, __u32 *priority)
00591 {
00592         struct list_head *e1;
00593         struct list_head *e2;
00594         lnet_remotenet_t *rnet;
00595         lnet_route_t     *route;
00596         int               cpt;
00597         int               i;
00598         struct list_head *rn_list;
00599 
00600         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00601 
00602         for (i = 0; i < LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_SIZE; i++) {
00603                 rn_list = &the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash[i];
00604                 list_for_each(e1, rn_list) {
00605                         rnet = list_entry(e1, lnet_remotenet_t, lrn_list);
00606 
00607                         list_for_each(e2, &rnet->lrn_routes) {
00608                                 route = list_entry(e2, lnet_route_t,
00609                                                    lr_list);
00610 
00611                                 if (idx-- == 0) {
00612                                         *net      = rnet->lrn_net;
00613                                         *hops     = route->lr_hops;
00614                                         *priority = route->lr_priority;
00615                                         *gateway  = route->lr_gateway->lp_nid;
00616                                         *alive    = lnet_is_route_alive(route);
00617                                         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00618                                         return 0;
00619                                 }
00620                         }
00621                 }
00622         }
00623 
00624         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00625         return -ENOENT;
00626 }
00627 
00628 void
00629 lnet_swap_pinginfo(lnet_ping_info_t *info)
00630 {
00631         int               i;
00632         lnet_ni_status_t *stat;
00633 
00634         __swab32s(&info->pi_magic);
00635         __swab32s(&info->pi_features);
00636         __swab32s(&info->pi_pid);
00637         __swab32s(&info->pi_nnis);
00638         for (i = 0; i < info->pi_nnis && i < LNET_MAX_RTR_NIS; i++) {
00639                 stat = &info->pi_ni[i];
00640                 __swab64s(&stat->ns_nid);
00641                 __swab32s(&stat->ns_status);
00642         }
00643         return;
00644 }
00645 
00650 static void
00651 lnet_parse_rc_info(lnet_rc_data_t *rcd)
00652 {
00653         lnet_ping_info_t        *info = rcd->rcd_pinginfo;
00654         struct lnet_peer        *gw   = rcd->rcd_gateway;
00655         lnet_route_t            *rte;
00656 
00657         if (!gw->lp_alive)
00658                 return;
00659 
00660         if (info->pi_magic == __swab32(LNET_PROTO_PING_MAGIC))
00661                 lnet_swap_pinginfo(info);
00662 
00663         /* NB always racing with network! */
00664         if (info->pi_magic != LNET_PROTO_PING_MAGIC) {
00665                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "%s: Unexpected magic %08x\n",
00666                        libcfs_nid2str(gw->lp_nid), info->pi_magic);
00667                 gw->lp_ping_feats = LNET_PING_FEAT_INVAL;
00668                 return;
00669         }
00670 
00671         gw->lp_ping_feats = info->pi_features;
00672         if ((gw->lp_ping_feats & LNET_PING_FEAT_MASK) == 0) {
00673                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "%s: Unexpected features 0x%x\n",
00674                        libcfs_nid2str(gw->lp_nid), gw->lp_ping_feats);
00675                 return; /* nothing I can understand */
00676         }
00677 
00678         if ((gw->lp_ping_feats & LNET_PING_FEAT_NI_STATUS) == 0)
00679                 return; /* can't carry NI status info */
00680 
00681         list_for_each_entry(rte, &gw->lp_routes, lr_gwlist) {
00682                 int     down = 0;
00683                 int     up = 0;
00684                 int     i;
00685 
00686                 if ((gw->lp_ping_feats & LNET_PING_FEAT_RTE_DISABLED) != 0) {
00687                         rte->lr_downis = 1;
00688                         continue;
00689                 }
00690 
00691                 for (i = 0; i < info->pi_nnis && i < LNET_MAX_RTR_NIS; i++) {
00692                         lnet_ni_status_t *stat = &info->pi_ni[i];
00693                         lnet_nid_t       nid = stat->ns_nid;
00694 
00695                         if (nid == LNET_NID_ANY) {
00696                                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "%s: unexpected LNET_NID_ANY\n",
00697                                        libcfs_nid2str(gw->lp_nid));
00698                                 gw->lp_ping_feats = LNET_PING_FEAT_INVAL;
00699                                 return;
00700                         }
00701 
00702                         if (LNET_NETTYP(LNET_NIDNET(nid)) == LOLND)
00703                                 continue;
00704 
00705                         if (stat->ns_status == LNET_NI_STATUS_DOWN) {
00706                                 down++;
00707                                 continue;
00708                         }
00709 
00710                         if (stat->ns_status == LNET_NI_STATUS_UP) {
00711                                 if (LNET_NIDNET(nid) == rte->lr_net) {
00712                                         up = 1;
00713                                         break;
00714                                 }
00715                                 continue;
00716                         }
00717 
00718                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "%s: Unexpected status 0x%x\n",
00719                                libcfs_nid2str(gw->lp_nid), stat->ns_status);
00720                         gw->lp_ping_feats = LNET_PING_FEAT_INVAL;
00721                         return;
00722                 }
00723 
00724                 if (up) { /* ignore downed NIs if NI for dest network is up */
00725                         rte->lr_downis = 0;
00726                         continue;
00727                 }
00728                 /* if @down is zero and this route is single-hop, it means
00729                  * we can't find NI for target network */
00730                 if (down == 0 && rte->lr_hops == 1)
00731                         down = 1;
00732 
00733                 rte->lr_downis = down;
00734         }
00735 }
00736 
00737 static void
00738 lnet_router_checker_event(lnet_event_t *event)
00739 {
00740         lnet_rc_data_t          *rcd = event->md.user_ptr;
00741         struct lnet_peer        *lp;
00742 
00743         LASSERT(rcd != NULL);
00744 
00745         if (event->unlinked) {
00746                 LNetInvalidateHandle(&rcd->rcd_mdh);
00747                 return;
00748         }
00749 
00750         LASSERT(event->type == LNET_EVENT_SEND ||
00751                 event->type == LNET_EVENT_REPLY);
00752 
00753         lp = rcd->rcd_gateway;
00754         LASSERT(lp != NULL);
00755 
00756          /* NB: it's called with holding lnet_res_lock, we have a few
00757           * places need to hold both locks at the same time, please take
00758           * care of lock ordering */
00759         lnet_net_lock(lp->lp_cpt);
00760         if (!lnet_isrouter(lp) || lp->lp_rcd != rcd) {
00761                 /* ignore if no longer a router or rcd is replaced */
00762                 goto out;
00763         }
00764 
00765         if (event->type == LNET_EVENT_SEND) {
00766                 lp->lp_ping_notsent = 0;
00767                 if (event->status == 0)
00768                         goto out;
00769         }
00770 
00771         /* LNET_EVENT_REPLY */
00772         /* A successful REPLY means the router is up.  If _any_ comms
00773          * to the router fail I assume it's down (this will happen if
00774          * we ping alive routers to try to detect router death before
00775          * apps get burned). */
00776 
00777         lnet_notify_locked(lp, 1, (event->status == 0), cfs_time_current());
00778         /* The router checker will wake up very shortly and do the
00779          * actual notification.
00780          * XXX If 'lp' stops being a router before then, it will still
00781          * have the notification pending!!! */
00782 
00783         if (avoid_asym_router_failure && event->status == 0)
00784                 lnet_parse_rc_info(rcd);
00785 
00786  out:
00787         lnet_net_unlock(lp->lp_cpt);
00788 }
00789 
00790 static void
00791 lnet_wait_known_routerstate(void)
00792 {
00793         lnet_peer_t      *rtr;
00794         struct list_head *entry;
00795         int               all_known;
00796 
00797         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_rc_state == LNET_RC_STATE_RUNNING);
00798 
00799         for (;;) {
00800                 int cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00801 
00802                 all_known = 1;
00803                 list_for_each(entry, &the_lnet.ln_routers) {
00804                         rtr = list_entry(entry, lnet_peer_t, lp_rtr_list);
00805 
00806                         if (rtr->lp_alive_count == 0) {
00807                                 all_known = 0;
00808                                 break;
00809                         }
00810                 }
00811 
00812                 lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00813 
00814                 if (all_known)
00815                         return;
00816 
00817                 set_current_state(TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
00818                 schedule_timeout(cfs_time_seconds(1));
00819         }
00820 }
00821 
00822 void
00823 lnet_router_ni_update_locked(lnet_peer_t *gw, __u32 net)
00824 {
00825         lnet_route_t *rte;
00826 
00827         if ((gw->lp_ping_feats & LNET_PING_FEAT_NI_STATUS) != 0) {
00828                 list_for_each_entry(rte, &gw->lp_routes, lr_gwlist) {
00829                         if (rte->lr_net == net) {
00830                                 rte->lr_downis = 0;
00831                                 break;
00832                         }
00833                 }
00834         }
00835 }
00836 
00837 static void
00838 lnet_update_ni_status_locked(void)
00839 {
00840         lnet_ni_t       *ni;
00841         long            now;
00842         int             timeout;
00843 
00844         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_routing);
00845 
00846         timeout = router_ping_timeout +
00847                   MAX(live_router_check_interval, dead_router_check_interval);
00848 
00849         now = cfs_time_current_sec();
00850         list_for_each_entry(ni, &the_lnet.ln_nis, ni_list) {
00851                 if (ni->ni_lnd->lnd_type == LOLND)
00852                         continue;
00853 
00854                 if (now < ni->ni_last_alive + timeout)
00855                         continue;
00856 
00857                 lnet_ni_lock(ni);
00858                 /* re-check with lock */
00859                 if (now < ni->ni_last_alive + timeout) {
00860                         lnet_ni_unlock(ni);
00861                         continue;
00862                 }
00863 
00864                 LASSERT(ni->ni_status != NULL);
00865 
00866                 if (ni->ni_status->ns_status != LNET_NI_STATUS_DOWN) {
00867                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "NI(%s:%d) status changed to down\n",
00868                                libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid), timeout);
00869                         /* NB: so far, this is the only place to set
00870                          * NI status to "down" */
00871                         ni->ni_status->ns_status = LNET_NI_STATUS_DOWN;
00872                 }
00873                 lnet_ni_unlock(ni);
00874         }
00875 }
00876 
00877 static void
00878 lnet_destroy_rc_data(lnet_rc_data_t *rcd)
00879 {
00880         LASSERT(list_empty(&rcd->rcd_list));
00881         /* detached from network */
00882         LASSERT(LNetHandleIsInvalid(rcd->rcd_mdh));
00883 
00884         if (rcd->rcd_gateway != NULL) {
00885                 int cpt = rcd->rcd_gateway->lp_cpt;
00886 
00887                 lnet_net_lock(cpt);
00888                 lnet_peer_decref_locked(rcd->rcd_gateway);
00889                 lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00890         }
00891 
00892         if (rcd->rcd_pinginfo != NULL)
00893                 LIBCFS_FREE(rcd->rcd_pinginfo, LNET_PINGINFO_SIZE);
00894 
00895         LIBCFS_FREE(rcd, sizeof(*rcd));
00896 }
00897 
00898 static lnet_rc_data_t *
00899 lnet_create_rc_data_locked(lnet_peer_t *gateway)
00900 {
00901         lnet_rc_data_t          *rcd = NULL;
00902         lnet_ping_info_t        *pi;
00903         int                     rc;
00904         int                     i;
00905 
00906         lnet_net_unlock(gateway->lp_cpt);
00907 
00908         LIBCFS_ALLOC(rcd, sizeof(*rcd));
00909         if (rcd == NULL)
00910                 goto out;
00911 
00912         LNetInvalidateHandle(&rcd->rcd_mdh);
00913         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rcd->rcd_list);
00914 
00915         LIBCFS_ALLOC(pi, LNET_PINGINFO_SIZE);
00916         if (pi == NULL)
00917                 goto out;
00918 
00919         for (i = 0; i < LNET_MAX_RTR_NIS; i++) {
00920                 pi->pi_ni[i].ns_nid = LNET_NID_ANY;
00921                 pi->pi_ni[i].ns_status = LNET_NI_STATUS_INVALID;
00922         }
00923         rcd->rcd_pinginfo = pi;
00924 
00925         LASSERT (!LNetHandleIsInvalid(the_lnet.ln_rc_eqh));
00926         rc = LNetMDBind((lnet_md_t){.start     = pi,
00927                                     .user_ptr  = rcd,
00928                                     .length    = LNET_PINGINFO_SIZE,
00929                                     .threshold = LNET_MD_THRESH_INF,
00930                                     .options   = LNET_MD_TRUNCATE,
00931                                     .eq_handle = the_lnet.ln_rc_eqh},
00932                         LNET_UNLINK,
00933                         &rcd->rcd_mdh);
00934         if (rc < 0) {
00935                 CERROR("Can't bind MD: %d\n", rc);
00936                 goto out;
00937         }
00938         LASSERT(rc == 0);
00939 
00940         lnet_net_lock(gateway->lp_cpt);
00941         /* router table changed or someone has created rcd for this gateway */
00942         if (!lnet_isrouter(gateway) || gateway->lp_rcd != NULL) {
00943                 lnet_net_unlock(gateway->lp_cpt);
00944                 goto out;
00945         }
00946 
00947         lnet_peer_addref_locked(gateway);
00948         rcd->rcd_gateway = gateway;
00949         gateway->lp_rcd = rcd;
00950         gateway->lp_ping_notsent = 0;
00951 
00952         return rcd;
00953 
00954  out:
00955         if (rcd != NULL) {
00956                 if (!LNetHandleIsInvalid(rcd->rcd_mdh)) {
00957                         rc = LNetMDUnlink(rcd->rcd_mdh);
00958                         LASSERT(rc == 0);
00959                 }
00960                 lnet_destroy_rc_data(rcd);
00961         }
00962 
00963         lnet_net_lock(gateway->lp_cpt);
00964         return gateway->lp_rcd;
00965 }
00966 
00967 static int
00968 lnet_router_check_interval (lnet_peer_t *rtr)
00969 {
00970         int secs;
00971 
00972         secs = rtr->lp_alive ? live_router_check_interval :
00973                                dead_router_check_interval;
00974         if (secs < 0)
00975                 secs = 0;
00976 
00977         return secs;
00978 }
00979 
00980 static void
00981 lnet_ping_router_locked (lnet_peer_t *rtr)
00982 {
00983         lnet_rc_data_t *rcd = NULL;
00984         cfs_time_t      now = cfs_time_current();
00985         int             secs;
00986 
00987         lnet_peer_addref_locked(rtr);
00988 
00989         if (rtr->lp_ping_deadline != 0 && /* ping timed out? */
00990             cfs_time_after(now, rtr->lp_ping_deadline))
00991                 lnet_notify_locked(rtr, 1, 0, now);
00992 
00993         /* Run any outstanding notifications */
00994         lnet_ni_notify_locked(rtr->lp_ni, rtr);
00995 
00996         if (!lnet_isrouter(rtr) ||
00997             the_lnet.ln_rc_state != LNET_RC_STATE_RUNNING) {
00998                 /* router table changed or router checker is shutting down */
00999                 lnet_peer_decref_locked(rtr);
01000                 return;
01001         }
01002 
01003         rcd = rtr->lp_rcd != NULL ?
01004               rtr->lp_rcd : lnet_create_rc_data_locked(rtr);
01005 
01006         if (rcd == NULL)
01007                 return;
01008 
01009         secs = lnet_router_check_interval(rtr);
01010 
01011         CDEBUG(D_NET,
01012                "rtr %s %d: deadline %lu ping_notsent %d alive %d "
01013                "alive_count %d lp_ping_timestamp %lu\n",
01014                libcfs_nid2str(rtr->lp_nid), secs,
01015                rtr->lp_ping_deadline, rtr->lp_ping_notsent,
01016                rtr->lp_alive, rtr->lp_alive_count, rtr->lp_ping_timestamp);
01017 
01018         if (secs != 0 && !rtr->lp_ping_notsent &&
01019             cfs_time_after(now, cfs_time_add(rtr->lp_ping_timestamp,
01020                                              cfs_time_seconds(secs)))) {
01021                 int               rc;
01022                 lnet_process_id_t id;
01023                 lnet_handle_md_t  mdh;
01024 
01025                 id.nid = rtr->lp_nid;
01026                 id.pid = LNET_PID_LUSTRE;
01027                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Check: %s\n", libcfs_id2str(id));
01028 
01029                 rtr->lp_ping_notsent   = 1;
01030                 rtr->lp_ping_timestamp = now;
01031 
01032                 mdh = rcd->rcd_mdh;
01033 
01034                 if (rtr->lp_ping_deadline == 0) {
01035                         rtr->lp_ping_deadline =
01036                                 cfs_time_shift(router_ping_timeout);
01037                 }
01038 
01039                 lnet_net_unlock(rtr->lp_cpt);
01040 
01041                 rc = LNetGet(LNET_NID_ANY, mdh, id, LNET_RESERVED_PORTAL,
01042                              LNET_PROTO_PING_MATCHBITS, 0);
01043 
01044                 lnet_net_lock(rtr->lp_cpt);
01045                 if (rc != 0)
01046                         rtr->lp_ping_notsent = 0; /* no event pending */
01047         }
01048 
01049         lnet_peer_decref_locked(rtr);
01050         return;
01051 }
01052 
01053 int
01054 lnet_router_checker_start(void)
01055 {
01056         int                     rc;
01057         int                     eqsz = 0;
01058         struct task_struct     *task;
01059 
01060         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_rc_state == LNET_RC_STATE_SHUTDOWN);
01061 
01062         if (check_routers_before_use &&
01063             dead_router_check_interval <= 0) {
01064                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x10a, "'dead_router_check_interval' must be"
01065                                    " set if 'check_routers_before_use' is set"
01066                                    "\n");
01067                 return -EINVAL;
01068         }
01069 
01070         sema_init(&the_lnet.ln_rc_signal, 0);
01071 
01072         rc = LNetEQAlloc(0, lnet_router_checker_event, &the_lnet.ln_rc_eqh);
01073         if (rc != 0) {
01074                 CERROR("Can't allocate EQ(%d): %d\n", eqsz, rc);
01075                 return -ENOMEM;
01076         }
01077 
01078         the_lnet.ln_rc_state = LNET_RC_STATE_RUNNING;
01079         task = kthread_run(lnet_router_checker, NULL, "router_checker");
01080         if (IS_ERR(task)) {
01081                 rc = PTR_ERR(task);
01082                 CERROR("Can't start router checker thread: %d\n", rc);
01083                 /* block until event callback signals exit */
01084                 down(&the_lnet.ln_rc_signal);
01085                 rc = LNetEQFree(the_lnet.ln_rc_eqh);
01086                 LASSERT(rc == 0);
01087                 the_lnet.ln_rc_state = LNET_RC_STATE_SHUTDOWN;
01088                 return -ENOMEM;
01089         }
01090 
01091         if (check_routers_before_use) {
01092                 /* Note that a helpful side-effect of pinging all known routers
01093                  * at startup is that it makes them drop stale connections they
01094                  * may have to a previous instance of me. */
01095                 lnet_wait_known_routerstate();
01096         }
01097 
01098         return 0;
01099 }
01100 
01101 void
01102 lnet_router_checker_stop (void)
01103 {
01104         int rc;
01105 
01106         if (the_lnet.ln_rc_state == LNET_RC_STATE_SHUTDOWN)
01107                 return;
01108 
01109         LASSERT (the_lnet.ln_rc_state == LNET_RC_STATE_RUNNING);
01110         the_lnet.ln_rc_state = LNET_RC_STATE_STOPPING;
01111         /* wakeup the RC thread if it's sleeping */
01112         wake_up(&the_lnet.ln_rc_waitq);
01113 
01114         /* block until event callback signals exit */
01115         down(&the_lnet.ln_rc_signal);
01116         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_rc_state == LNET_RC_STATE_SHUTDOWN);
01117 
01118         rc = LNetEQFree(the_lnet.ln_rc_eqh);
01119         LASSERT (rc == 0);
01120         return;
01121 }
01122 
01123 static void
01124 lnet_prune_rc_data(int wait_unlink)
01125 {
01126         lnet_rc_data_t          *rcd;
01127         lnet_rc_data_t          *tmp;
01128         lnet_peer_t             *lp;
01129         struct list_head         head;
01130         int                      i = 2;
01131 
01132         if (likely(the_lnet.ln_rc_state == LNET_RC_STATE_RUNNING &&
01133                    list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_rcd_deathrow) &&
01134                    list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_rcd_zombie)))
01135                 return;
01136 
01137         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&head);
01138 
01139         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01140 
01141         if (the_lnet.ln_rc_state != LNET_RC_STATE_RUNNING) {
01142                 /* router checker is stopping, prune all */
01143                 list_for_each_entry(lp, &the_lnet.ln_routers,
01144                                     lp_rtr_list) {
01145                         if (lp->lp_rcd == NULL)
01146                                 continue;
01147 
01148                         LASSERT(list_empty(&lp->lp_rcd->rcd_list));
01149                         list_add(&lp->lp_rcd->rcd_list,
01150                                  &the_lnet.ln_rcd_deathrow);
01151                         lp->lp_rcd = NULL;
01152                 }
01153         }
01154 
01155         /* unlink all RCDs on deathrow list */
01156         list_splice_init(&the_lnet.ln_rcd_deathrow, &head);
01157 
01158         if (!list_empty(&head)) {
01159                 lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01160 
01161                 list_for_each_entry(rcd, &head, rcd_list)
01162                         LNetMDUnlink(rcd->rcd_mdh);
01163 
01164                 lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01165         }
01166 
01167         list_splice_init(&head, &the_lnet.ln_rcd_zombie);
01168 
01169         /* release all zombie RCDs */
01170         while (!list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_rcd_zombie)) {
01171                 list_for_each_entry_safe(rcd, tmp, &the_lnet.ln_rcd_zombie,
01172                                          rcd_list) {
01173                         if (LNetHandleIsInvalid(rcd->rcd_mdh))
01174                                 list_move(&rcd->rcd_list, &head);
01175                 }
01176 
01177                 wait_unlink = wait_unlink &&
01178                               !list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_rcd_zombie);
01179 
01180                 lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01181 
01182                 while (!list_empty(&head)) {
01183                         rcd = list_entry(head.next,
01184                                          lnet_rc_data_t, rcd_list);
01185                         list_del_init(&rcd->rcd_list);
01186                         lnet_destroy_rc_data(rcd);
01187                 }
01188 
01189                 if (!wait_unlink)
01190                         return;
01191 
01192                 i++;
01193                 CDEBUG(((i & (-i)) == i) ? D_WARNING : D_NET,
01194                        "Waiting for rc buffers to unlink\n");
01195                 set_current_state(TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
01196                 schedule_timeout(cfs_time_seconds(1) / 4);
01197 
01198                 lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01199         }
01200 
01201         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01202 }
01203 
01204 /*
01205  * This function is called to check if the RC should block indefinitely.
01206  * It's called from lnet_router_checker() as well as being passed to
01207  * wait_event_interruptible() to avoid the lost wake_up problem.
01208  *
01209  * When it's called from wait_event_interruptible() it is necessary to
01210  * also not sleep if the rc state is not running to avoid a deadlock
01211  * when the system is shutting down
01212  */
01213 static inline bool
01214 lnet_router_checker_active(void)
01215 {
01216         if (the_lnet.ln_rc_state != LNET_RC_STATE_RUNNING)
01217                 return true;
01218 
01219         /* Router Checker thread needs to run when routing is enabled in
01220          * order to call lnet_update_ni_status_locked() */
01221         if (the_lnet.ln_routing)
01222                 return true;
01223 
01224         return !list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_routers) &&
01225                 (live_router_check_interval > 0 ||
01226                  dead_router_check_interval > 0);
01227 }
01228 
01229 static int
01230 lnet_router_checker(void *arg)
01231 {
01232         lnet_peer_t       *rtr;
01233         struct list_head  *entry;
01234 
01235         cfs_block_allsigs();
01236 
01237         while (the_lnet.ln_rc_state == LNET_RC_STATE_RUNNING) {
01238                 __u64   version;
01239                 int     cpt;
01240                 int     cpt2;
01241 
01242                 cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
01243 rescan:
01244                 version = the_lnet.ln_routers_version;
01245 
01246                 list_for_each(entry, &the_lnet.ln_routers) {
01247                         rtr = list_entry(entry, lnet_peer_t, lp_rtr_list);
01248 
01249                         cpt2 = lnet_cpt_of_nid_locked(rtr->lp_nid);
01250                         if (cpt != cpt2) {
01251                                 lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01252                                 cpt = cpt2;
01253                                 lnet_net_lock(cpt);
01254                                 /* the routers list has changed */
01255                                 if (version != the_lnet.ln_routers_version)
01256                                         goto rescan;
01257                         }
01258 
01259                         lnet_ping_router_locked(rtr);
01260 
01261                         /* NB dropped lock */
01262                         if (version != the_lnet.ln_routers_version) {
01263                                 /* the routers list has changed */
01264                                 goto rescan;
01265                         }
01266                 }
01267 
01268                 if (the_lnet.ln_routing)
01269                         lnet_update_ni_status_locked();
01270 
01271                 lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01272 
01273                 lnet_prune_rc_data(0); /* don't wait for UNLINK */
01274 
01275                 /* Call schedule_timeout() here always adds 1 to load average
01276                  * because kernel counts # active tasks as nr_running
01277                  * + nr_uninterruptible. */
01278                 /* if there are any routes then wakeup every second.  If
01279                  * there are no routes then sleep indefinitely until woken
01280                  * up by a user adding a route */
01281                 if (!lnet_router_checker_active())
01282                         wait_event_interruptible(the_lnet.ln_rc_waitq,
01283                                                  lnet_router_checker_active());
01284                 else
01285                         wait_event_interruptible_timeout(the_lnet.ln_rc_waitq,
01286                                                          false,
01287                                                          cfs_time_seconds(1));
01288         }
01289 
01290         lnet_prune_rc_data(1); /* wait for UNLINK */
01291 
01292         the_lnet.ln_rc_state = LNET_RC_STATE_SHUTDOWN;
01293         up(&the_lnet.ln_rc_signal);
01294         /* The unlink event callback will signal final completion */
01295         return 0;
01296 }
01297 
01298 void
01299 lnet_destroy_rtrbuf(lnet_rtrbuf_t *rb, int npages)
01300 {
01301         int sz = offsetof(lnet_rtrbuf_t, rb_kiov[npages]);
01302 
01303         while (--npages >= 0)
01304                 __free_page(rb->rb_kiov[npages].kiov_page);
01305 
01306         LIBCFS_FREE(rb, sz);
01307 }
01308 
01309 static lnet_rtrbuf_t *
01310 lnet_new_rtrbuf(lnet_rtrbufpool_t *rbp, int cpt)
01311 {
01312         int            npages = rbp->rbp_npages;
01313         int            sz = offsetof(lnet_rtrbuf_t, rb_kiov[npages]);
01314         struct page   *page;
01315         lnet_rtrbuf_t *rb;
01316         int            i;
01317 
01318         LIBCFS_CPT_ALLOC(rb, lnet_cpt_table(), cpt, sz);
01319         if (rb == NULL)
01320                 return NULL;
01321 
01322         rb->rb_pool = rbp;
01323 
01324         for (i = 0; i < npages; i++) {
01325                 page = cfs_page_cpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(), cpt,
01326                                           GFP_KERNEL | __GFP_ZERO);
01327                 if (page == NULL) {
01328                         while (--i >= 0)
01329                                 __free_page(rb->rb_kiov[i].kiov_page);
01330 
01331                         LIBCFS_FREE(rb, sz);
01332                         return NULL;
01333                 }
01334 
01335                 rb->rb_kiov[i].kiov_len = PAGE_CACHE_SIZE;
01336                 rb->rb_kiov[i].kiov_offset = 0;
01337                 rb->rb_kiov[i].kiov_page = page;
01338         }
01339 
01340         return rb;
01341 }
01342 
01343 static void
01344 lnet_rtrpool_free_bufs(lnet_rtrbufpool_t *rbp, int cpt)
01345 {
01346         int              npages = rbp->rbp_npages;
01347         lnet_rtrbuf_t    *rb;
01348         struct list_head tmp;
01349 
01350         if (rbp->rbp_nbuffers == 0) /* not initialized or already freed */
01351                 return;
01352 
01353         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tmp);
01354 
01355         lnet_net_lock(cpt);
01356         lnet_drop_routed_msgs_locked(&rbp->rbp_msgs, cpt);
01357         list_splice_init(&rbp->rbp_bufs, &tmp);
01358         rbp->rbp_req_nbuffers = 0;
01359         rbp->rbp_nbuffers = rbp->rbp_credits = 0;
01360         rbp->rbp_mincredits = 0;
01361         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01362 
01363         /* Free buffers on the free list. */
01364         while (!list_empty(&tmp)) {
01365                 rb = list_entry(tmp.next, lnet_rtrbuf_t, rb_list);
01366                 list_del(&rb->rb_list);
01367                 lnet_destroy_rtrbuf(rb, npages);
01368         }
01369 }
01370 
01371 static int
01372 lnet_rtrpool_adjust_bufs(lnet_rtrbufpool_t *rbp, int nbufs, int cpt)
01373 {
01374         struct list_head rb_list;
01375         lnet_rtrbuf_t   *rb;
01376         int             num_rb;
01377         int             num_buffers = 0;
01378         int             old_req_nbufs;
01379         int             npages = rbp->rbp_npages;
01380 
01381         lnet_net_lock(cpt);
01382         /* If we are called for less buffers than already in the pool, we
01383          * just lower the req_nbuffers number and excess buffers will be
01384          * thrown away as they are returned to the free list.  Credits
01385          * then get adjusted as well.
01386          * If we already have enough buffers allocated to serve the
01387          * increase requested, then we can treat that the same way as we
01388          * do the decrease. */
01389         num_rb = nbufs - rbp->rbp_nbuffers;
01390         if (nbufs <= rbp->rbp_req_nbuffers || num_rb <= 0) {
01391                 rbp->rbp_req_nbuffers = nbufs;
01392                 lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01393                 return 0;
01394         }
01395         /* store the older value of rbp_req_nbuffers and then set it to
01396          * the new request to prevent lnet_return_rx_credits_locked() from
01397          * freeing buffers that we need to keep around */
01398         old_req_nbufs = rbp->rbp_req_nbuffers;
01399         rbp->rbp_req_nbuffers = nbufs;
01400         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01401 
01402         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rb_list);
01403 
01404         /* allocate the buffers on a local list first.  If all buffers are
01405          * allocated successfully then join this list to the rbp buffer
01406          * list.  If not then free all allocated buffers. */
01407         while (num_rb-- > 0) {
01408                 rb = lnet_new_rtrbuf(rbp, cpt);
01409                 if (rb == NULL) {
01410                         CERROR("Failed to allocate %d route bufs of %d pages\n",
01411                                nbufs, npages);
01412 
01413                         lnet_net_lock(cpt);
01414                         rbp->rbp_req_nbuffers = old_req_nbufs;
01415                         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01416 
01417                         goto failed;
01418                 }
01419 
01420                 list_add(&rb->rb_list, &rb_list);
01421                 num_buffers++;
01422         }
01423 
01424         lnet_net_lock(cpt);
01425 
01426         list_splice_tail(&rb_list, &rbp->rbp_bufs);
01427         rbp->rbp_nbuffers += num_buffers;
01428         rbp->rbp_credits += num_buffers;
01429         rbp->rbp_mincredits = rbp->rbp_credits;
01430         /* We need to schedule blocked msg using the newly
01431          * added buffers. */
01432         while (!list_empty(&rbp->rbp_bufs) &&
01433                !list_empty(&rbp->rbp_msgs))
01434                 lnet_schedule_blocked_locked(rbp);
01435 
01436         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01437 
01438         return 0;
01439 
01440 failed:
01441         while (!list_empty(&rb_list)) {
01442                 rb = list_entry(rb_list.next, lnet_rtrbuf_t, rb_list);
01443                 list_del(&rb->rb_list);
01444                 lnet_destroy_rtrbuf(rb, npages);
01445         }
01446 
01447         return -ENOMEM;
01448 }
01449 
01450 static void
01451 lnet_rtrpool_init(lnet_rtrbufpool_t *rbp, int npages)
01452 {
01453         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rbp->rbp_msgs);
01454         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rbp->rbp_bufs);
01455 
01456         rbp->rbp_npages = npages;
01457         rbp->rbp_credits = 0;
01458         rbp->rbp_mincredits = 0;
01459 }
01460 
01461 void
01462 lnet_rtrpools_free(int keep_pools)
01463 {
01464         lnet_rtrbufpool_t *rtrp;
01465         int               i;
01466 
01467         if (the_lnet.ln_rtrpools == NULL) /* uninitialized or freed */
01468                 return;
01469 
01470         cfs_percpt_for_each(rtrp, i, the_lnet.ln_rtrpools) {
01471                 lnet_rtrpool_free_bufs(&rtrp[LNET_TINY_BUF_IDX], i);
01472                 lnet_rtrpool_free_bufs(&rtrp[LNET_SMALL_BUF_IDX], i);
01473                 lnet_rtrpool_free_bufs(&rtrp[LNET_LARGE_BUF_IDX], i);
01474         }
01475 
01476         if (!keep_pools) {
01477                 cfs_percpt_free(the_lnet.ln_rtrpools);
01478                 the_lnet.ln_rtrpools = NULL;
01479         }
01480 }
01481 
01482 static int
01483 lnet_nrb_tiny_calculate(void)
01484 {
01485         int     nrbs = LNET_NRB_TINY;
01486 
01487         if (tiny_router_buffers < 0) {
01488                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x10c,
01489                                    "tiny_router_buffers=%d invalid when "
01490                                    "routing enabled\n", tiny_router_buffers);
01491                 return -EINVAL;
01492         }
01493 
01494         if (tiny_router_buffers > 0)
01495                 nrbs = tiny_router_buffers;
01496 
01497         nrbs /= LNET_CPT_NUMBER;
01498         return max(nrbs, LNET_NRB_TINY_MIN);
01499 }
01500 
01501 static int
01502 lnet_nrb_small_calculate(void)
01503 {
01504         int     nrbs = LNET_NRB_SMALL;
01505 
01506         if (small_router_buffers < 0) {
01507                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x10c,
01508                                    "small_router_buffers=%d invalid when "
01509                                    "routing enabled\n", small_router_buffers);
01510                 return -EINVAL;
01511         }
01512 
01513         if (small_router_buffers > 0)
01514                 nrbs = small_router_buffers;
01515 
01516         nrbs /= LNET_CPT_NUMBER;
01517         return max(nrbs, LNET_NRB_SMALL_MIN);
01518 }
01519 
01520 static int
01521 lnet_nrb_large_calculate(void)
01522 {
01523         int     nrbs = LNET_NRB_LARGE;
01524 
01525         if (large_router_buffers < 0) {
01526                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x10c,
01527                                    "large_router_buffers=%d invalid when "
01528                                    "routing enabled\n", large_router_buffers);
01529                 return -EINVAL;
01530         }
01531 
01532         if (large_router_buffers > 0)
01533                 nrbs = large_router_buffers;
01534 
01535         nrbs /= LNET_CPT_NUMBER;
01536         return max(nrbs, LNET_NRB_LARGE_MIN);
01537 }
01538 
01539 int
01540 lnet_rtrpools_alloc(int im_a_router)
01541 {
01542         lnet_rtrbufpool_t *rtrp;
01543         int     nrb_tiny;
01544         int     nrb_small;
01545         int     nrb_large;
01546         int     rc;
01547         int     i;
01548 
01549         if (!strcmp(forwarding, "")) {
01550                 /* not set either way */
01551                 if (!im_a_router)
01552                         return 0;
01553         } else if (!strcmp(forwarding, "disabled")) {
01554                 /* explicitly disabled */
01555                 return 0;
01556         } else if (!strcmp(forwarding, "enabled")) {
01557                 /* explicitly enabled */
01558         } else {
01559                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x10b, "'forwarding' not set to either "
01560                                    "'enabled' or 'disabled'\n");
01561                 return -EINVAL;
01562         }
01563 
01564         nrb_tiny = lnet_nrb_tiny_calculate();
01565         if (nrb_tiny < 0)
01566                 return -EINVAL;
01567 
01568         nrb_small = lnet_nrb_small_calculate();
01569         if (nrb_small < 0)
01570                 return -EINVAL;
01571 
01572         nrb_large = lnet_nrb_large_calculate();
01573         if (nrb_large < 0)
01574                 return -EINVAL;
01575 
01576         the_lnet.ln_rtrpools = cfs_percpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(),
01577                                                 LNET_NRBPOOLS *
01578                                                 sizeof(lnet_rtrbufpool_t));
01579         if (the_lnet.ln_rtrpools == NULL) {
01580                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x10c,
01581                                    "Failed to initialize router buffe pool\n");
01582                 return -ENOMEM;
01583         }
01584 
01585         cfs_percpt_for_each(rtrp, i, the_lnet.ln_rtrpools) {
01586                 lnet_rtrpool_init(&rtrp[LNET_TINY_BUF_IDX], 0);
01587                 rc = lnet_rtrpool_adjust_bufs(&rtrp[LNET_TINY_BUF_IDX],
01588                                               nrb_tiny, i);
01589                 if (rc != 0)
01590                         goto failed;
01591 
01592                 lnet_rtrpool_init(&rtrp[LNET_SMALL_BUF_IDX],
01593                                   LNET_NRB_SMALL_PAGES);
01594                 rc = lnet_rtrpool_adjust_bufs(&rtrp[LNET_SMALL_BUF_IDX],
01595                                               nrb_small, i);
01596                 if (rc != 0)
01597                         goto failed;
01598 
01599                 lnet_rtrpool_init(&rtrp[LNET_LARGE_BUF_IDX],
01600                                   LNET_NRB_LARGE_PAGES);
01601                 rc = lnet_rtrpool_adjust_bufs(&rtrp[LNET_LARGE_BUF_IDX],
01602                                               nrb_large, i);
01603                 if (rc != 0)
01604                         goto failed;
01605         }
01606 
01607         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01608         the_lnet.ln_routing = 1;
01609         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01610         return 0;
01611 
01612  failed:
01613         lnet_rtrpools_free(0);
01614         return rc;
01615 }
01616 
01617 static int
01618 lnet_rtrpools_adjust_helper(int tiny, int small, int large)
01619 {
01620         int nrb = 0;
01621         int rc = 0;
01622         int i;
01623         lnet_rtrbufpool_t *rtrp;
01624 
01625         /* If the provided values for each buffer pool are different than the
01626          * configured values, we need to take action. */
01627         if (tiny >= 0) {
01628                 tiny_router_buffers = tiny;
01629                 nrb = lnet_nrb_tiny_calculate();
01630                 cfs_percpt_for_each(rtrp, i, the_lnet.ln_rtrpools) {
01631                         rc = lnet_rtrpool_adjust_bufs(&rtrp[LNET_TINY_BUF_IDX],
01632                                                       nrb, i);
01633                         if (rc != 0)
01634                                 return rc;
01635                 }
01636         }
01637         if (small >= 0) {
01638                 small_router_buffers = small;
01639                 nrb = lnet_nrb_small_calculate();
01640                 cfs_percpt_for_each(rtrp, i, the_lnet.ln_rtrpools) {
01641                         rc = lnet_rtrpool_adjust_bufs(&rtrp[LNET_SMALL_BUF_IDX],
01642                                                       nrb, i);
01643                         if (rc != 0)
01644                                 return rc;
01645                 }
01646         }
01647         if (large >= 0) {
01648                 large_router_buffers = large;
01649                 nrb = lnet_nrb_large_calculate();
01650                 cfs_percpt_for_each(rtrp, i, the_lnet.ln_rtrpools) {
01651                         rc = lnet_rtrpool_adjust_bufs(&rtrp[LNET_LARGE_BUF_IDX],
01652                                                       nrb, i);
01653                         if (rc != 0)
01654                                 return rc;
01655                 }
01656         }
01657 
01658         return 0;
01659 }
01660 
01661 int
01662 lnet_rtrpools_adjust(int tiny, int small, int large)
01663 {
01664         /* this function doesn't revert the changes if adding new buffers
01665          * failed.  It's up to the user space caller to revert the
01666          * changes. */
01667 
01668         if (!the_lnet.ln_routing)
01669                 return 0;
01670 
01671         return lnet_rtrpools_adjust_helper(tiny, small, large);
01672 }
01673 
01674 int
01675 lnet_rtrpools_enable(void)
01676 {
01677         int rc;
01678 
01679         if (the_lnet.ln_routing)
01680                 return 0;
01681 
01682         if (the_lnet.ln_rtrpools == NULL)
01683                 /* If routing is turned off, and we have never
01684                  * initialized the pools before, just call the
01685                  * standard buffer pool allocation routine as
01686                  * if we are just configuring this for the first
01687                  * time. */
01688                 return lnet_rtrpools_alloc(1);
01689 
01690         rc = lnet_rtrpools_adjust_helper(0, 0, 0);
01691         if (rc != 0)
01692                 return rc;
01693 
01694         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01695         the_lnet.ln_routing = 1;
01696 
01697         the_lnet.ln_ping_info->pi_features &= ~LNET_PING_FEAT_RTE_DISABLED;
01698         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01699 
01700         return 0;
01701 }
01702 
01703 void
01704 lnet_rtrpools_disable(void)
01705 {
01706         if (!the_lnet.ln_routing)
01707                 return;
01708 
01709         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01710         the_lnet.ln_routing = 0;
01711         the_lnet.ln_ping_info->pi_features |= LNET_PING_FEAT_RTE_DISABLED;
01712 
01713         tiny_router_buffers = 0;
01714         small_router_buffers = 0;
01715         large_router_buffers = 0;
01716         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01717         lnet_rtrpools_free(1);
01718 }
01719 
01720 int
01721 lnet_notify(lnet_ni_t *ni, lnet_nid_t nid, int alive, cfs_time_t when)
01722 {
01723         struct lnet_peer        *lp = NULL;
01724         cfs_time_t              now = cfs_time_current();
01725         int                     cpt = lnet_cpt_of_nid(nid);
01726 
01727         LASSERT (!in_interrupt ());
01728 
01729         CDEBUG (D_NET, "%s notifying %s: %s\n",
01730                 (ni == NULL) ? "userspace" : libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid),
01731                 libcfs_nid2str(nid),
01732                 alive ? "up" : "down");
01733 
01734         if (ni != NULL &&
01735             LNET_NIDNET(ni->ni_nid) != LNET_NIDNET(nid)) {
01736                 CWARN ("Ignoring notification of %s %s by %s (different net)\n",
01737                         libcfs_nid2str(nid), alive ? "birth" : "death",
01738                         libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid));
01739                 return -EINVAL;
01740         }
01741 
01742         /* can't do predictions... */
01743         if (cfs_time_after(when, now)) {
01744                 CWARN ("Ignoring prediction from %s of %s %s "
01745                        "%ld seconds in the future\n",
01746                        (ni == NULL) ? "userspace" : libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid),
01747                        libcfs_nid2str(nid), alive ? "up" : "down",
01748                        cfs_duration_sec(cfs_time_sub(when, now)));
01749                 return -EINVAL;
01750         }
01751 
01752         if (ni != NULL && !alive &&             /* LND telling me she's down */
01753             !auto_down) {                       /* auto-down disabled */
01754                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Auto-down disabled\n");
01755                 return 0;
01756         }
01757 
01758         lnet_net_lock(cpt);
01759 
01760         if (the_lnet.ln_shutdown) {
01761                 lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01762                 return -ESHUTDOWN;
01763         }
01764 
01765         lp = lnet_find_peer_locked(the_lnet.ln_peer_tables[cpt], nid);
01766         if (lp == NULL) {
01767                 /* nid not found */
01768                 lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01769                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "%s not found\n", libcfs_nid2str(nid));
01770                 return 0;
01771         }
01772 
01773         /* We can't fully trust LND on reporting exact peer last_alive
01774          * if he notifies us about dead peer. For example ksocklnd can
01775          * call us with when == _time_when_the_node_was_booted_ if
01776          * no connections were successfully established */
01777         if (ni != NULL && !alive && when < lp->lp_last_alive)
01778                 when = lp->lp_last_alive;
01779 
01780         lnet_notify_locked(lp, ni == NULL, alive, when);
01781 
01782         if (ni != NULL)
01783                 lnet_ni_notify_locked(ni, lp);
01784 
01785         lnet_peer_decref_locked(lp);
01786 
01787         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01788         return 0;
01789 }
01790 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lnet_notify);
